about:
Welcome to my profile. My name is Szekeres László and I'm a graphic designer, with many years of experience. I live in the beautiful city of Oradea, Romania, with my even more beautiful wife, Henrietta:). My "designer career" started when I was 4 and I drew tons of cows and horses..^^ Since then I developed my ability, until graphic design became my passion and my job as well.
  If you like my works and you are interested in logo or stationary design, feel free to contact me.

about: I have a passion for designing detailed, creative and modern graphics, My skills cover many aspects of graphic design and illustrations. about: I am an artist with 13+ years of experience in digital drawing, photography, graphic design, clay sculpting, jewelry making, crafting, and painting. I've been doing digital drawing commissions for customers for 7+ years. I'm currently self employed by creating jewelry, stickers, and other crafts that I sell on my Etsy store, along with hosting vendor booths at events. I do all the graphic design for my store; my stickers, my logos, my product labeling, and doing all my own product photography.

about: Hi, my name is Francesco Saviano. The computer graphics and photography are my world. I love what I do and I'm always looking for new trends and inspirations for my creations. I use Photoshop to create modern website templates and book covers. I use Illustrator to create awesome logos. My background also   includes basic knowledge of the Blender 3D modeling software. I have intermediate knowledge of 3d Texturing. My job is my greatest passion. In my free time I paint in oil.

  I work until the client is 100% happy with the final product.

about:

My abilities and experience are far-ranging. I have all the necessary skills to see a given project from first idea through conceptual development and design to final product.

about: I am a graphic designer specializing in logo and visual identity. I prefer a simple, clean, and abstract design style. I always try my best to create original and memorable design concepts. about:
Hi! I'm Edward B, a Graphic Designer based in Romania. I have experience in Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Illustrator. I have been working as a Graphic Designer for two years, and this is my passion. I genuinely believe that a good freelancer can fit any project in their area of work!
  If you like my style and my work and you think I would be a good fit for your project, leave me a message to discuss our next project!

about: Hello! My name is Tara, and I am a veteran graphic designer of 11 years and a certified Adobe Illustrator master. I specialize in branding, logo, and social media design with a focus on vector artwork. I am competent in a wide variety of styles, but bespoke freehand logo designs watercolor embellishments and a feminine flair are my specialty.

I am registered with 99d since 2018, but I started working on the site even in February 2020. I am passionate about what I do.

about:
Hey there, my name is Adnan and I am here to help you grow your business. I am a passionate graphic designer with over seven years of experience.
  I do Brand Ids, Logos, Business Cards, and many more.
  Your information and requirements always give me the inspiration to come up with amazing ideas and provide creativity as per your expectation.
  So why wait? Hire me now!

about: Sou um designer gráfico que surgiu das capas de discos do Peter Saville, das vinhetas do Saul Bass e dos cartazes de Lambe-lambe. No Brasil, além do lambe-lambe, tem o Gustavo Piqueira e o Kiko Farkas, que inspiram minhas coisas. Trabalho muito com design editorial, mas não dispenso o branding que corre em minhas veias. No mais, sou um libriano tranquilo com ascendência em empolgação criativa.

about: You might not have realized, but  I am a self taught graphic designer.  And I work under the storefront « Kærn Design ». I have a bachelor degree in Art History and Japanese Civilisation. For a long time I have been enthusiastic about the universe of images. This firstly lead me to painting and drawing (which I still practice actively). But eventually I started to feel the need to put my artistic visual competences to a more practical and concrete use.  So here I am today !

about: I have been a designer for 8 years, initially I stood out in areas such as print creation, WordPress pages, animation. When I went out to work I began to work in an NGO for 3 years, in that I was in charge of doing branding, make printed material. Then I went to work with several international design studios for 4 years where I worked as an Art Director, this led me to fall more in love with branding and illustration, currently I am working only as a freelance.
